Plot: Circus Halli Galli is a late-night talk show that is broadcasted on ProSieben since 25 February-2013. It is moderated by Joko Winterscheidt and Klaas Heufer-Umlauf, better known as the duo Joko and Klaas.
Title: Circus Halligalli
Actors: Joko Winterscheidt, Klaas Heufer-Umlauf, Violetta Grafin Tarnowska Bronner
